Name: Turret Defense: Bug Invasion
About the game: Man the turrets! Bugs are invading Earth and you're the only one left to stop them in this arcade-style endless game. Chase high scores as you use the mouse to aim the turret from a top-down perspective against different types of bugs. Just don't get overwhelmed in Turret Defense: Bug Invasion ! Features: Arcade-Style Gameplay Loop Wave-Based Progression Bugs Rockin' Tunes
